development changes can occur 
leading to some babies having 
an extra chromosome causing 
Down’s syndrome, Edwards’ 
syndrome or Patau’s syndrome. 
First trimester screening tests 
are	not	currently	offered	as	
part of routine antenatal care in 
Northern Ireland. If you would like 
these tests to be carried out you 
may have to pay privately.
Test results
The screening test will not tell 
you whether your baby does or 
does not have Down’s, Edwards’
